name: 15TH INTERNATIONAL SILK ROAD VIRTUAL CONFERENCE
content: 15th International Silk Road Conference will be organized in Tbilisi, Georgia, October 9-10, 2020\. Gathering of top professionals in the fields of Politics, Journalism, Economics, History, Art, Literature, Culture, Public Administration, Law, Business, and Technology will cater for a wholesome environment dedicated to practices, challenges and opportunities we are experiencing in this modern world.
